parameters.name: parameters
parameters.summary: Properties to set on a new object, including any defined by Modules.Map.Annotation except those marked not-creation or read-only.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.summary: Properties to set on a new object, including any defined by Modules.Map.Camera except those marked not-creation or read-only.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.summary: Properties to set on a new object, including any defined by Modules.Map.Circle except those marked not-creation or read-only.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.summary: Properties to set on a new object, including any defined by Modules.Map.ImageOverlay except those marked not-creation or read-only.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.summary: Properties to set on a new object, including any defined by Modules.Map.Polygon except those marked not-creation or read-only.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.summary: Properties to set on a new object, including any defined by Modules.Map.Polyline except those marked not-creation or read-only.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.summary: Properties to set on a new object, including any defined by Modules.Map.Route except those marked not-creation or read-only.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.summary: Properties to set on a new object, including any defined by Modules.Map.Snapshotter except those marked not-creation or read-only.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.summary: Properties to set on a new object, including any defined by Modules.Map.StreetViewPanorama except those marked not-creation or read-only.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.summary: Properties to set on a new object, including any defined by Modules.Map.View except those marked not-creation or read-only.

methods.name: isGooglePlayServicesAvailable
methods.summary: Returns a code to indicate whether Google Play Services is available on the device.

returns.summary: One of the following status codes: SUCCESS, SERVICE_MISSING, SERVICE_VERSION_UPDATE_REQUIRED, SERVICE_DISABLED or SERVICE_INVALID.

constants.name: ANNOTATION_AZURE
constants.summary: Color constant used to set a map annotation to azure via the pincolor property.

constants.name: ANNOTATION_BLUE
constants.summary: Color constant used to set a map annotation to blue via the pincolor property.

constants.name: ANNOTATION_CYAN
constants.summary: Color constant used to set a map annotation to cyan via the pincolor property.

constants.name: ANNOTATION_DRAG_STATE_END
constants.summary: Used in the pinchangedragstate event to indicate that the user finished moving the annotation.

constants.name: ANNOTATION_DRAG_STATE_START
constants.summary: Used in the pinchangedragstate event to indicate that the user started dragging the annotation.

constants.name: ANNOTATION_GREEN
constants.summary: Color constant used to set a map annotation to green via the pincolor property.

constants.name: ANNOTATION_MAGENTA
constants.summary: Color constant used to set a map annotation to magenta via the pincolor property.

constants.name: ANNOTATION_ORANGE
constants.summary: Color constant used to set a map annotation to orange via the pincolor property.

constants.name: ANNOTATION_PURPLE
constants.summary: Color constant used to set a map annotation to purple via the pincolor property.

constants.name: ANNOTATION_RED
constants.summary: Color constant used to set a map annotation to red via the pincolor property.

constants.name: ANNOTATION_ROSE
constants.summary: Color constant used to set a map annotation to rose via the pincolor property.

constants.name: ANNOTATION_VIEW_COLLISION_MODE_CIRCLE
constants.summary: Constant indicating that a circle inscribed in the collision frame rectangle should be used to determine collisions.

constants.name: ANNOTATION_VIEW_COLLISION_MODE_RECTANGLE
constants.summary: Constant indicating that the full collision frame rectangle should be used for detecting collisions.

constants.name: ANNOTATION_VIOLET
constants.summary: Color constant used to set a map annotation to violet via the pincolor property.

constants.name: ANNOTATION_YELLOW
constants.summary: Color constant used to set a map annotation to yellow via the pincolor property.

constants.name: FEATURE_DISPLAY_PRIORITY_DEFAULT_HIGH
constants.summary: Constant indicating that the item's display priority is high.
constants.description: An annotation view with this priority is removed from the map when its bounds collide with the bounds of another view with a higher priority. If the priorities of the two views are equal, the view furthest from the center of the map's visible region is hidden first.

constants.name: FEATURE_DISPLAY_PRIORITY_DEFAULT_LOW
constants.summary: Constant indicating that the item's display priority is low.
constants.description: An annotation view with this priority is removed from the map when its bounds collide with the bounds of another view with a higher priority. If the priorities of the two views are equal, the view furthest from the center of the map's visible region is hidden first.

constants.name: FEATURE_DISPLAY_PRIORITY_REQUIRED
constants.summary: Constant indicating that the item is required.
constants.description: An annotation view with this priority does not participate in clustering.

constants.name: FEATURE_VISIBILITY_ADAPTIVE
constants.summary: Constant indicating that title text adapts to the current map state.
constants.description: For markers in the normal state, title text is displayed and subtitle text is hidden. When a marker is selected, the title and subtitle text are hidden when the marker requires a callout.

constants.name: FEATURE_VISIBILITY_HIDDEN
constants.summary: Constant indicating that title text is always hidden.

constants.name: FEATURE_VISIBILITY_VISIBLE
constants.summary: Constant indicating that title text is always visible.

constants.name: HYBRID_FLYOVER_TYPE
constants.summary: Used with mapType to display a satellite flyover image of the area with road and road name information layered on top. Available in iOS 9.0 and later.

constants.name: HYBRID_TYPE
constants.summary: Used with mapType to display a satellite image of the area with road and road name information layered on top.

constants.name: MUTED_STANDARD_TYPE
constants.summary: Used with mapType to display a street map where your data is emphasized over the underlying map details. Available in iOS 11.0 and later. On Android it is mapped to NORMAL_TYPE.

constants.name: NORMAL_TYPE
constants.summary: Used with mapType to display a street map that shows the position of all roads and some road names.

constants.name: OVERLAY_LEVEL_ABOVE_LABELS
constants.summary: Place the overlay above roadways but below map labels, shields, or point-of-interest icons. Available in iOS 7.0 and later.

constants.name: OVERLAY_LEVEL_ABOVE_ROADS
constants.summary: Place the overlay above map labels, shields, or point-of-interest icons but below annotations and 3D projections of buildings. Available in iOS 7.0 and later.

constants.name: POLYLINE_PATTERN_DASHED
constants.summary: Polyline type constant used to display a dashed polyline via pattern property.

constants.name: POLYLINE_PATTERN_DOTTED
constants.summary: Polyline type constant used to display a dotted polyline via pattern property.

constants.name: REASON_API_ANIMATION
constants.summary: Used in the regionwillchange event. The animation was initiated in response to the user actions.

constants.name: REASON_DEVELOPER_ANIMATION
constants.summary: Used in the regionwillchange event. The camera moved in response to a request from the application.

constants.name: REASON_GESTURE
constants.summary: Used in the regionwillchange event. The camera moved in response to the user gestures on the map.

constants.name: SATELLITE_FLYOVER_TYPE
constants.summary: Used with mapType to display satellite flyover imagery of the area. Available in iOS 9.0 and later.

constants.name: SATELLITE_TYPE
constants.summary: Used with mapType to display satellite imagery of the area.

constants.name: SERVICE_DISABLED
constants.summary: Code returned from isGooglePlayServicesAvailable. Google Play services has been disabled on this device.

constants.name: SERVICE_INVALID
constants.summary: Code returned from isGooglePlayServicesAvailable. The version of Google Play services installed on this device is not authentic.

constants.name: SERVICE_MISSING
constants.summary: Code returned from isGooglePlayServicesAvailable. Google Play services is not installed on the device.

constants.name: SERVICE_VERSION_UPDATE_REQUIRED
constants.summary: Code returned from isGooglePlayServicesAvailable. Google Play services is out of date.

constants.name: SUCCESS
constants.summary: Code returned from isGooglePlayServicesAvailable. Google Play services is available, and the connection is successful.

constants.name: TERRAIN_TYPE
constants.summary: Used with mapType to display the terrain that shows the position of all roads and some road names.
